    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"

>
[Azarketi Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2680) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 395, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 5

**Prerequisites**
[Azarketi Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2671)

</column>

---

Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in [crossbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67), [hand crossbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69), [longspears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), [spears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), [tridents](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45), and all [azarketi](/Traits.aspx?ID=336) weapons in which you are trained.
